website_summaries.verdict: Stands out for its super small size and a software package to help you enhance and manage your images.
pros: Comes with a 2.7-inch TFT LCD screen
Images up to 21 megapixels, with 720p resolution for video
Rechargeable lithium ion battery good for 60 minutes of use
Functions include anti-shake, face detection, and smile capture
Bundled with Pho Tag Express photo management software
cons: Some felt that the camera's automatic settings are not sensitive enough
The manual that comes with the camera is very small and hard to read

customer_reviews.title: REALLY Horrible Camera
customer_reviews.text: Even after adjusting this camera's settings every possible way, the picture quality is really awful. The colors are all washed out and faded, pictures are either really dark or ridiculously bright, and never true to color. The "no shake" is useless, as most photos are blurry. Wish I hadn't waited to try this out, so I could return it. Truly is garbage. Now we have to buy another camera. If there were negative stars, I would have rated it as such. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: The Pflugs

customer_reviews.title: Even with a phone it is good to have a cost effective camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for work to keep from loading up my personal cloud storage with work pictures. The usb interface is faster than emailing them to myself from my phone. Also since I am using this for work not nearly as much cost of I lose this or drop it getting the picture of a nameplate on the backside of a machine. I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Billy D. Conner

customer_reviews.title: Pictures
customer_reviews.text: for some reason, the default setting on the camera is not ready for just aim and shoot, and the overall menu is really difficult to go through. I have worked on it and gotten it down, I also wish the charger was standard like most phones, but they have there, own plugin for the camera part on the charger vs other standard chargers on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not 21MP but still a cute little camera.
customer_reviews.text: Please disregard earlier review. The camera is cute and ok for what it is. Still pissed that it was list as 21MP when it's really on 18MP. I hadn't opened the box to see that IS actually black. It'll do as a backup to my phone while on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Future gift for granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: Set it up per instructions and tested it. The photos are good quality. Lots of features, will see if a very young granddaughter who will receive this camera, is able to figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: GeoR_Sr

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, not even worth the $40
customer_reviews.text: Cheap cheap cheap! Never used it because it was so cheap, i was scared it would break and I wouldn't be able to return it. I sent it right back. It's plastic and feels like a toy.
customer_reviews.author: Nani26

customer_reviews.title: Good for the $
customer_reviews.text: The size is nice, most pics are good, we just have some random shot that turn out blurry. For the most part though we are happy we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Linam g

customer_reviews.title: Cute little camera!!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for someone who is starting to learn photography. I got it for my 7 year niece and she loves it. Its compact and can fit in a purse too.
customer_reviews.author: MamtaLovesAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Bought it for my mom who was going to travel but it didn’t work. I would take one picture and it would freeze. Tried a few times but same thing. Such a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy M

customer_reviews.title: Can't Read Support Materials (Very Small Micro Font)
customer_reviews.text: The "How to Use" Booklet is very small and the print can not be read without the use of a magnifying glass or jeweler magnifier headset. Someone sure cut corners on booklet. Bad beginning in trying to get camera in use... Recommend taking a pass on this camera due to the very difficult to read/use support booklet.. Pictures/Diagrams that support camera options are too small too. Very poor....
customer_reviews.author: B. Lemen

product_meta.title: GordVE KINGEAR 2.7 inch TFT LCD HD Mini Digital Camera
product_meta.description:
Specifications: 
* Image Sensor:CMOS Sensor 
* Video Resolution:1280*720 HD,640*480 VGA,320*240 QVGA 
* LCD Display:2.7" TFT LCD 
* External Memory:SD card(up to 32GB) 
* Exposure:EV-3---EV+3 
* White Balance:Auto/Daylight/Cloudy/Incandescent/Fluorescent 
* Sence:Auto/Night Portrait/Night Scenery/Portrait/Scenery/Beach/High sensitivity 
* ISO:Auto/100/200/400 
* Self-timer:Off/2s/5s/10s 
* File Format:JPGE/AVI 
* Flash:Auto/Force/Red-eye reduction/Off 
* Interface:USB 2.0 
* System Requirement:Windows XP/VISTA/MAC 
* Battery:Li-ion Battery

Package Included: 
* 1 x Digital Camera 
* 1 x USB cable 
* 1 x Charger 
* 1 x User's manual
feature_bullets: Main features:2.7 inch TFT LCD,Built in flash.
Pho Tags Express software for managing and enhanceing your photos,printing,sending photos by e-mails and much more.
It can note only take good quality digital photos but also can be used as removable disk.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars16 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
